data.proxyObjectName: metal calibration weight cylinder labeled 'M 500g' on top
data.utilizationMethod: Clasp the cylinder with the whole hand wrapping around its sides, lift it vertically, rotate it gently, and set it down upright
Stand beside the chair and use the upright backrest fabric as a wide vertical plane for light taps or sweeping strokes
Pinch the pen near its tip with thumb, index, and middle finger, rest ring and little finger on the barrel, and perform precise wrist-controlled strokes.

data.proxyObjectName: white spray bottle with blue liquid inside
data.utilizationMethod: Hold the bottle upright by the neck and run two fingertips down the smooth cylindrical body toward the base.
Hold a corner of the sponge between thumb and index finger, compress that corner about one centimeter and let it expand back while pointing the squeezed edge downward
